On Apr 14, 2007, at 9:06 AM, Derek James wrote:

> The new system will probably be enough unlike NEAT that it won't  
> bear the label, but I'll keep this group posted on the work, as it  
> will still be relevant and I'm guessing/hoping people here will be  
> interested.

Haven't read the book, though I may put it on the giant backlog.

That said, I'm personally *extremely* interested in your work, so  
yes, post it here!  :)

--Steve
--Apple-Mail-10-732453172
